name: Succinct Labs
intro: Succinct light clients for all consensus protocols
introduce: Succinct Labs is dedicated to building the foundation of a decentralized, permissionless, and secure interoperability layer for blockchains. Succinct has released a gas efficient on-chain light client for Ethereum PoS, powered by succinct zero-knowledge proofs (zkSNARKs), allowing for arbitrary, trust-minimized cross-chain communication between Ethereum and Gnosis Chain.
